kpi_info.title: Peak of IP based WCDMA access port capacity license usage ratio
kpi_info.use: Indicates the peak usage ratio of IP based WCDMA (Iu-CS) access port capacity license MGW Iu IP 3G port capacity (Iu-IP-termination) in the measured MGW
